listOfQuestions.question: Who was the first president of the United States?

Who wrote the Declaration of Independence?

What famous event took place on July 4, 1776?
Who assassinated President Abraham Lincoln?
Which amendment gave women the right to vote?

How many original colonies were there in America?
Who was the president during the Great Depression and World War II?
Which famous speech begins with the words 'Four score and seven years ago'?
Who was the first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean?
Which war was fought between the United States and Spain in 1898?
Who was the commander of the Confederate Army during the Civil War?
What event triggered the United States' entry into World War I?
Which U.S. president is known for the Louisiana Purchase?
Who was the first African American to serve on the Supreme Court?
Which amendment to the U.S. Constitution guarantees freedom of speech, press, and religion?

Which U.S. president is known for the Emancipation Proclamation?
Who was known as the 'Father of the Constitution'?
Which battle is considered the turning point of the American Revolution?

What was the last battle of the American Revolution?

Which landmark Supreme Court case established the principle of judicial review?
Who was the primary author of the Federalist Papers?
Which president is known for the creation of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)?

Which amendment to the U.S. Constitution gives women the right to vote?
Who was the president during the Cuban Missile Crisis?
Which U.S. city was the site of the first shots fired in the Civil War?
What was the purpose of the Lewis and Clark expedition?
wrongAnswers: To find a water route to Asia
